thread.title: LeEco Super4 Ecotv series launched in India, prices start at Rs 42,490
thread.title_full: LeEco Super4 Ecotv series launched in India, prices start at Rs 42,490

title: LeEco Super4 Ecotv series launched in India, prices start at Rs 42,490
text:
LeEco Super4 Ecotv series launched in India, prices start at Rs 42,490 LeEco Super4 Ecotv series launched in India, prices start at Rs 42,490 By March 16, 2017 “LeEco’s new Super4 series TVs offer HDR 10 for a more realistic picture quality” 
Chinese technology conglomerate LeEco has expanded its range of televisions in India with the launch of the Super4 Ecotv series models. The Super4 Ecotv series consists of three models – the Super4 X40, Super4 X43 Pro and Super4 X50 Pro. The brand’s new TVs are powered by EUI 5.8, which is based on Android 6.0 Marshmallow. 
The LeEco Super4 Ecotv series models flaunt HDR 10, which as per the brand creates pictures that are more realistic, with greater contrast between highlights and shadows. They feature MEMC dynamic image processing, which eliminates blurring, trails and judder with enhanced picture quality. They also get Dolby Audio and DTS HD Sound enhancement. The Super4 X50 Pro also features Harman Kardon speakers. Related read: LeEco Super4 X40 first impressions: a stylish TV with built in smarts 
The LeEco Super4 series feature 64-bit 1.7GHz quad-core Mstar 6A938 chipsets, Mali T820-MP3 graphics, M-Genuine S1 Pro Image engines, 3GB of RAM, up to 32GB of storage, dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.1, DLNA, Airplay, two HDMI 3.0 ports and two HDMI 2.0 ports. 
Individually, the LeEco Super4 X40 features a 40-inch full HD LED display. The Super4 X43 Pro gets a 43-inch Ultra HD screen. The Super4 X50 Pro boasts a 50-inch Ultra HD LED display with 3D capabilities. 
Coming to the pricing, the LeEco Super4 X40 has been priced at Rs 46,990, but is available for Rs 42,490 as part of the special launch offer. The Super4 X43 Pro is being offered for Rs 57,490, compared to the regular Rs 63,990 price tag. The Super4 X50 Pro for Rs 78,490, while the regular price is Rs 86,990. The brand is also offering an additional 10 percent cashback (max Rs 5,000) or six months no extra cost EMI till March 22nd with the new TVs. They are up for grabs on LeMall.com . Facebook Comments
